N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3050.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the purpose of the Onondaga County Water Authority to
supply and sell water for domestic, commercial and public purposes at retail to
individual customers within the County of Onondaga or at wholesale in the
manner provided under subdivision eight of section
1154
of
the Public Authorities Law; to purchase, construct, lease and operate water
systems and properties in Onondaga County, and in the Towns of Sullivan, Lenox
and Lincoln in Madison County, and Volney in Oswego County; and to carry out
all powers and duties granted and imposed, pursuant to title 7 of the Public

Authorities Law. In meeting these objectives, the authority seeks to strike a
suitable balance among competing social, economic and environmental factors. It
is the intention of this Part that such factors be incorporated in the
decision-making processes of the authority. It is not the intention of this

Part that environmental factors be the sole consideration in the authority's
decision-making. Notes
